comment: Very nice professor. Class is split between lecture and activities. As long as you participate you will be fine!
SUCH A SWEETHEART!!! I love Dee! She is amazing. The class is so boring but she makes it fun. The tests kinda sneak up on you, so be prepared for them. Great Teacher! Love Love Love her!

I LOVE Professor Grindell, she is one of the best professors I have had so far. I had her in the morning and she was so good at keeping us awake and interested. She does a lot of hands on activities which were fun. Tests are relatively easy, but does require studying and reading the textbook(s). Take her and you will love her!!

Bottom line, she is an AMAZING woman and absolute joy to be around. This is a class you look forward to coming to and enjoy the entire semester. If you have the moment to take her you should its worth it!

One of the sweetest ladies I've met. The class is overall easy if you do the work. It is somewhat challenginf to get an A on projects, but tests and classwork make up for it(I got an A). Her tests are just like the study guide. A lot of classroom activities( the only way I managed to stay awake in the morning). Take her, it's a fun and easy class.
She's just wonderful. So helpful! I would definitely recommend this class to freshmen. She's there for you inside and outside the classroom.

I LOVE HER!!!! She is the sweetest professor i have ever met. she is definitely there for you and understands that you have other things to do. her class is so much fun, and FABULOUS. her tests are really hard but theres extra credit and other assignments that will help your grade. if she taught other courses i would definitely take her again.
Professor Grindell is amazing! "It's exciting" is a popular phrase you'll here throughout the semester! Pretty easy class that really connects you to fellow students. Felt like a homeroom class.
Great prof. Enthusiastic, doesn't bog you down, she's aware you have a bajillion things to do. Shows you how to "let it go" and tells you you're fabulous everyday.
She's amazing!! The class is easy and fun. She really cares about her students and will strive to help you do well!

I took this class at 9:30AM and she always had so much energy. Every class we would always do an activity. She was always helpful and would answer an question. Tests would come from PowerPoints and textbook. One service project and one essay had to be completed in this class. I recommended this professor.

SO FUN!! You can tell teaching comes naturally to her and she makes it as fun as possible. She made a real point of getting to know the students, or at the very least remembering our names, which is very important to me. The specific class I took was for student athletes so I would see her at some of our games cheering us on. I highly recommend her
BEST PROFESSOR EVER. She is so nice and encouraging. She lets you be yourself in the classroom and things get pretty ridiculous in the best way. Great intro to college, really really awesome.

I absolutely love Professor Grindell! She is an amazing teacher and an amazing person in general. She is super sweet and funny. She is very intelligent and keeps things interesting. She has a real passion for her work which really shows. She truly wants to see her students succeed. My favorite class I've taken so far.
She is an awesome professor. the class is very pointless. the class is unnecessary and KSU should not require this class.

Professor Grindell is AMAZING! She is always so energetic and happy! She tries to make every class fun! There's a lot of work, but it's all SUPER easy and she grades very leniently. She is always very sweet, and understands that there's alot of work so she always tries to give you more time.

Professor Grindell was AMAZING! if you have the chance to get her, do it! She is always happy to see her students, and helps make learning fun. she's hilarious, and will assist in class work. there's a lot to do, but it's mainly small things, and she will do what she can to make sure you get an A. she was an absolute delight!!

Ms. Grindell is amazing. She truly cares about her students and how they are doing, not only in her class but in all of them.  She is extremely enthusiastic and always happy to teach. She believes in a lot of activities and there are many points available to gain. Take her if you can! She will touch your heart.

I LOVE PROFESSOR GRINDELL!!! You have to take her while at Kennesaw she is one of the most enthusiastic, friendly people I have ever met. I love personality and her attitude is always positive. Her catch phrases like YIPPIE SKIPPY and FABULOUS keep the class laughing. She is extremely light-hearted and believes in lots off activities. PLEASE TAKE!!

BEST TEACHER EVER!!! So enthusiastic and always has an engaging activity prepared for each class. Class is easy but requires attendance and study time outside of class. TAKE PROF GRINDELL IF YOU HAVE THE CHOICE!!!

Professor Grindell has so much love for her students. She is cheerful and passionate about what she does, and believes that each student can succeed. She goes the extra mile to make sure the students know, too. She is the most FABULOUS teacher to have in the mornings. One of my all-time favorites.
Best teacher at KSU hands down! Makes coming to class exciting and is very enthusiastic. 4 tests, a speech, group project. Study and Attend class regularly will guarantee an A!
Very nice. Cares about her students. Highly recommended. Makes class fun.

"EXCITING!"  i had her for a 930 class and her enthusiastic tone really wakes you up in the morning.  She really works hard to make sure you succeed. she'll drop other plans to help you study if you need additional help (not that you would since she teaches so well).  You have to take Prof Grindell while at KSU!

She is by far the best teacher I've ever had. She made my 8 A.M. class so much more enjoyable. The tests were not that hard and she practically gave you the answers. I Definitely recommend her. Easy A if you attend class, she offers a lot of extra credit as well.

BEST PROFESSOR EVER! You CANNOT go to Kennesaw without taking her. She is just FAAAAABULOUS. She cares about all of her students and wants them all to be successful. She takes time to know everyone personally from the get go. Attendance isn't mandatory but she really wants you to attend class. TAKE HER! You won't regret it :)
Loved her! Easy A.

This class is a great class to have if you are being taught by Ms. Grindell! She is very nice and helpful to everyone. You can tell that she is happy to be there and teach. Easy A if you apply yourself and study for tests.
Fabulous professor! Do what is assigned and you will make a good grade.  Gives opportunity for extra credit all the time.

Ms. Grindell always greets everyone with a smile. She is very helpful and she responds to Vista mail very quickly. She is very pumped about her job. Her tests are a little hard, but that result can be due to lack of reading. As long as you do a little reading and listen to her review the day (or 2) before the test, you'll fly through this class.
FABULOUS!! Please take her. You will not regret. She is an amazing person and teacher. Extremely helpful. If you graduate from KSU without having her, you will be missing out.
LOVE her!!! She is the best professor ever!!!! I still go by and see her lol. I recommend her to everyone who has to take this class. She gets 100!!!!!!

this professor is just FABULOUS cant go wrong with professor grindell awesome, easy, very laid back, and she cares about her students...wouldnt be surprised if she were to show up to her students graduations just to dance on a chair for them
THE BEST TEACHER EVER!!!!

She cares ALOT about you and how you are doing. This is an EASY class, with the most loving and caring prof. She is very laid back and offers lots of extra credit. I only took 3 tests and they were very simple. TAKE THIS CLASS!

Get her class if you can! She's an amazing prof that really enjoys teaching and helping people. The class is meant to help freshman students and that is exactly what she does. Her lectures are over stuff that will actually be useful to you and all assaignments are fair.
All I can say is awesome!!!  She is great, easy, awesomely funny and sweet.  Easy A if you do the work!!!

She's just "FABULOUS"! She's always cheery, and VERY laid back when it comes to grading. Looks for the good in all her students, I think she genuinely enjoys teaching. I really can't think of anything negative to say about her at all. She makes KSU1101 worth going to, and she's by FAR my favorite professor thus far. TAKE HER! You won't regret it.

She is extremely clear in her lecture, what she wants on her tests and she is totally 100% fair.  She is really sweet.  She makes you want to go to class if you're having a hard day.  Her class is something to look forward to!!!

So funny "lookin' good" easy just read the book and take notes. SO fair, compromises on everything, you set rules. I got her, her 1st time teaching the course, so we had no common reader test.  extra credit for campus events you go to.  fun class, TAKE HER, can't say enough great things about her.  fun fact: she's a twin.
I loved Ms. Dee. she was a great teacher and what she taught was very helpful. She was committed to being more than fair. Shes very easy going and doesnt have many rules.
